function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 through respiratory droplets","Impact":"Potential rapid spread of the virus within close proximity","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures and use of protective gear","Technologies":"Face masks, physical barriers, ventilation systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, employers"},{"Description":"Indirect transmission of COVID-19 via contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus through surface contact","Mitigation":"Application of virus-inactivating solutions on surfaces, regular cleaning and disinfection","Technologies":"Disinfectants, UV-C light, antimicrobial materials","People":"General public, cleaning staff, maintenance workers","Owner":"Facility managers, employers, building owners"},{"Description":"Risks associated with the use of copper as a virus-inactivating solution","Impact":"Potential uncertainty about the effectiveness of copper in virus inactivation","Mitigation":"Validation of copper's antimicrobial properties, sourcing high-quality copper materials","Technologies":"Testing for antimicrobial efficacy, quality control processes","People":"Researchers, manufacturers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory agencies, industry stakeholders"}]}
